title: Services
text:
I offer a range of services to help you achieve your goals. Below are some of the skills I am available for hire on a per-hour billing model.


Machine Learning Consulting
Brief Description: Providing expert advice and solutions for your machine learning projects. - Key Skills: Python, TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn - Hourly Rate: $100/hour - Contact: Get in Touch


Data Analysis
Brief Description: Analyzing your data to extract meaningful insights and drive decision-making. - Key Skills: Python, Pandas, SQL - Hourly Rate: $80/hour - Contact: Get in Touch


Web Development
Brief Description: Building responsive and dynamic websites tailored to your needs. - Key Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React - Hourly Rate: $90/hour - Contact: Get in Touch


DevOps Engineering
Brief Description: Implementing CI/CD pipelines and automating your infrastructure. - Key Skills: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins - Hourly Rate: $110/hour - Contact: Get in Touch

title: Project P002: Edge AI CICD
text: This project focuses on the implementation of Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) for Edge AI applications.

title: Chetan Kadway [ML Researcher | Edge AI]
text:
Personal Contact Info







Email: your-email@example.com
Phone: +123-456-7890
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/yourprofile
GitHub: github.com/yourusername

title: Chetan Kadway [ML Researcher | Edge AI]
text:
Career Summary






I am an experienced ML Researcher specializing in Edge AI with a strong background in developing and deploying machine learning models on edge devices. I have a proven track record of delivering high-impact projects and contributing to cutting-edge research in the field.

title: Chetan Kadway [ML Researcher | Edge AI]
text:
Key Technical Skills







Programming Languages: Python, C++, JavaScript
Machine Learning: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn
Data Analysis: Pandas, NumPy, SQL
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins
Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React

title: Chetan Kadway [ML Researcher | Edge AI]
text:
Education Background







Ph.D. in Computer Science - University of XYZ, 2020
M.S. in Artificial Intelligence - University of ABC, 2016
B.S. in Computer Science - University of DEF, 2014

title: Chetan Kadway [ML Researcher | Edge AI]
text:
Key Projects


Project 1: Edge AI CI/CD
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for Edge AI applications using Docker, Kubernetes, and Jenkins.


Project 2: AI Model Deployment
Explored the deployment of AI models on edge devices using Avassa.

title: Chetan Kadway [ML Researcher | Edge AI]
text:
Research Publications







Paper 1: “Title of Research Paper 1”, Journal of XYZ, 2021
Paper 2: “Title of Research Paper 2”, Conference on ABC, 2020

title: Chetan Kadway [ML Researcher | Edge AI]
text:
Key Achievements Timeline







2022: Awarded “Best Researcher” at the International AI Conference
2021: Published a groundbreaking paper on Edge AI in the Journal of XYZ
2020: Completed Ph.D. in Computer Science with a focus on Edge AI
2019: Developed a novel AI model for real-time data analysis on edge devices
